name: Dino Hunter Battle Simulator
description:
Meet the survival battle simulator!
Select warriors for you army! Choose big dino hunter army or angry dinosaurs army!
Buy in store yourself fighters. Arrange each of them to a certain place and start royal battle!
Try to collect the largest and strongest army.

After starting, watch the simulation of the battle - you can consider from different view points use joystick in left screen and swipe for rotate camera.

Start a grand battle with game Dino Hunter Battle Simulator!
